textBox.richText: The European Association for Biometrics (EAB) organized its annual Symposium in Martigny Switzerland on Jan 19 2016 afternoon after the meetings of the ISO/IEC JTC1 SC37 Biometrics.   The Symposium focused on Presentation Attacks and Presentation Attack Detection ( http://www.eab.org/events/program/108 ).    The Symposium also revealed the two main outcomes of the European BEAT project: • a methodology for Common Criteria evaluations of biometric systems, • the BEAT platform as a tool for the characterization of biometric performance.
EAB Symposium on Presentation Attack Detection
